channel.title: Lednerb on My cool new Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lednerb on My cool new Blog

item.title: Support and Discussions
item.description: Hey there! This Premium Theme is published under an open source license so you can use it for your blog. It took me 100+ hours of work to create one of the best Hugo themes out there. If you enjoy this theme and want to stay informed about the latest releases and features or want to say thanks and discuss with other users, join our Discord server:

item.title: My Trip to Scotland
item.description: In June 2017 I’ve visited Scotland with my best friend for two weeks. We drove a lot through the beautiful countryside and saw a lot of different animals: cattle, deer, birds, dolphins, and sheep. Sheep everywhere! At one beautiful camping site, we saw cattle in fog in the very early morning and took a picture of it. The image now has the title “Rindviehcher im Nebel”, a quite funny German phrase that means cattle in the fog.

item.title: Installing Bilberry Theme
item.description: You will find all information to setup this theme with your hugo site on the official Github Repository.
